meta.title: {{name}} - COH3 Player Profile
meta.description: {{name}}'s Company of Heroes 3 player profile with {{totalGames}} games played and {{winRate}}% win rate. View detailed statistics, match history, and faction performance.

helpers.bestRankAchieved: Best Rank Achieved. Lower is better. The best Rank the player ever had.
helpers.bestEloAchieved: Best ELO Achieved. Higher is better. The best ELO the player ever had.

activity.title: Player Activity

noData.reportMessage: If this error persists, please report it on

activity.timezoneHelper: The activity hour data is collected in UTC timezone. You can adjust the display to your local timezone using this selector.

teamsStandings.title: Arranged Teams Standings
teamsStandings.noData: No teams data available for this player
teamsStandings.checkTeamDetails: For match and ELO change history check the team details
teamsStandings.helperText: Arranged teams are tracked only by COH3 Stats, see more info in the about page

teamDetails.title: Team Details
teamDetails.teamNotFound: Team not found. Please check the team ID and try again.

teamsTable.eloHelper: Unofficial ELO tracked by COH3 Stats only, see more info in the about page

teamMatchesTable.clickForDetails: Click on the row for more details
teamMatchesTable.teamEloHelper: This shows TEAM ELO change tracked by COH3 Stats, this is different ELO then player standings ELO. COH3 Stats ELO is not used for matchmaking.
teamMatchesTable.playerEloHelper: The ELO showned here is the individual player standing ELO in the particular mode and faction.

widget.title: Top 10 - 1v1 Nemesis
widget.helperText: Nemesis counter has be to 'triggered' by playing the same player 2 times in 1 day (UTC timezone). After the trigger, all 1v1 games with that player are counted. Aliases are saved from the last game played with that player. Only Steam players are tracked.

rules.triggerCondition: Trigger by playing with the same player 2 times in 1 day (UTC).
rules.aliases: Aliases are saved from the last game played with that player
rules.counting: After the trigger, all 1v1 games with that player are counted.
rules.updateTime: Data are updated once a day 6 AM UTC.
